attributes.action: Reseravble Disabled Seats On Public Transport
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to pass a law to make it compulsory for public transport companies to set aside seats for people with disabilities and serious health conditions, which can be reserved in advance.

This will enable those affected by serious health issues to continue to work and not be forced out of jobs they want and need because public transport is too unsafe for them to use.
